head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials ALFANDRE, JULIAN, DR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials ALFANDRE, JULIAN, DR.

block.p: ALFANDRE-Julian, Dr. June 21, 1940-September 7, 1997. On this day which would have been your 60th birthday, all your flowers bloom. Each reflect the integrity, power and beauty that was your provenance, your gift. You are missed, revered and celebrated in equal measure and with abiding love. Rachel, Jimmy, David and Natalie
